Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library
  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a library, which hold a collection of books. Patrons can register at the library to be able to check out books, if a copy of the requested book is available.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Library​(int maxBookCapacity, int maxBorrowedBooks, int maxPatronCapacity)
      Creates a new library with the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) int addBookToLibrary​(Book book)
      Adds the given book to this library, if there is place available, and it isn't already in the library.
      (package private) boolean borrowBook​(int bookId, int patronId)
      Marks the book with the given id number as borrowed by the patron with the given patron id, if this book is available, the given patron isn't already borrowing the maximal number of books allowed, and if the patron will enjoy this book.
      (package private) int getBookId​(Book book)
      Returns the non-negative id number of the given book if he is owned by this library, -1 otherwise.
      (package private) int getPatronId​(Patron patron)
      Returns the non-negative id number of the given patron if he is registered to this library, -1 otherwise.
      (package private) boolean isBookAvailable​(int bookId)
      Returns true if the book with the given id is available, false otherwise.
      (package private) boolean isBookIdValid​(int bookId)
      Returns true if the given number is an id of some book in the library, false otherwise.
      (package private) boolean isPatronIdValid​(int patronId)
      Returns true if the given number is an id of a patron in the library, false otherwise.
      (package private) int registerPatronToLibrary​(Patron patron)
      Registers the given Patron to this library, if there is a spot available.
      (package private) void returnBook​(int bookId)
      Return the given book.
      (package private) Book suggestBookToPatron​(int patronId)
      Suggest the patron with the given id the book he will enjoy the most, out of all available books he will enjoy, if any such exist.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        Library​(int maxBookCapacity,
        int maxBorrowedBooks,
        int maxPatronCapacity)
        Creates a new library with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        maxBookCapacity - The maximal number of books this library can hold.
        maxBorrowedBooks - The maximal number of books this library allows a single patron to borrow at the same time.
        maxPatronCapacity - The maximal number of registered patrons this library can handle.

    • Method Detail

      • addBookToLibrary

        int addBookToLibrary​(Book book)
        Adds the given book to this library, if there is place available, and it isn't already in the library.
        Parameters:
        book - The book to add to this library.
        Returns:
        a non-negative id number for the book if there was a spot and the book was successfully added, or if the book was already in the library; a negative number otherwise.

      • isBookIdValid

        boolean isBookIdValid​(int bookId)
        Returns true if the given number is an id of some book in the library, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        bookId - bookId - The id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given number is an id of some book in the library, false otherwise.

      • getBookId

        int getBookId​(Book book)
        Returns the non-negative id number of the given book if he is owned by this library, -1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        book - The book for which to find the id number.
        Returns:
        a non-negative id number of the given book if he is owned by this library, -1 otherwise.

      • isBookAvailable

        boolean isBookAvailable​(int bookId)
        Returns true if the book with the given id is available, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        bookId - The id number of the book to check.
        Returns:
        true if the book with the given id is available, false otherwise.

      • registerPatronToLibrary

        int registerPatronToLibrary​(Patron patron)
        Registers the given Patron to this library, if there is a spot available.
        Parameters:
        patron - The patron to register to this library.
        Returns:
        a non-negative id number for the patron if there was a spot and the patron was successfully registered or if the patron was already registered. a negative number otherwise.

      • isPatronIdValid

        boolean isPatronIdValid​(int patronId)
        Returns true if the given number is an id of a patron in the library, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        patronId - The id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given number is an id of a patron in the library, false otherwise.

      • getPatronId

        int getPatronId​(Patron patron)
        Returns the non-negative id number of the given patron if he is registered to this library, -1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        patron - The patron for which to find the id number.
        Returns:
        a non-negative id number of the given patron if he is registered to this library, -1 otherwise.

      • borrowBook

        boolean borrowBook​(int bookId,
                   int patronId)
        Marks the book with the given id number as borrowed by the patron with the given patron id, if this book is available, the given patron isn't already borrowing the maximal number of books allowed, and if the patron will enjoy this book.
        Parameters:
        bookId - The id number of the book to borrow.
        patronId - The id number of the patron that will borrow the book.
        Returns:
        true if the book was borrowed successfully, false otherwise.

      • returnBook

        void returnBook​(int bookId)
        Return the given book.
        Parameters:
        bookId - The id number of the book to return.

      • suggestBookToPatron

        Book suggestBookToPatron​(int patronId)
        Suggest the patron with the given id the book he will enjoy the most, out of all available books he will enjoy, if any such exist.
        Parameters:
        patronId - The id number of the patron to suggest the book to.
        Returns:
        The available book the patron with the given ID will enjoy the most. Null if no book is available.
